ygData.subject: RE: Great post on item balancing (Long)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m telling you, put on a pretty face and beg in permafrost =) I always had a soft spot for mini Harmonics running around, as I too am a old hoot who
ygData.messageBody:
> isn't possible at my level. There are no good weapons dropped that a group
> of my level could get that a bard can use that are better than my dirk.
> Hmmm, maybe the dirk is the unbalanced part!


I'm telling you, put on a pretty face and beg in permafrost =)

I always had a soft spot for mini Harmonics running around, as
I too am a old hoot who remembers the hardships of those days.
I have a silvery war axe and another crystalline blade in the
bank, along with my old steel and charred. You should start
over on Innoruuk. <g>

Harmonic.
